title: In an alternate universe, male and female brains are so different, that they cannot speak or learn the same languages. What else is different as a result?

body: Success rate of marriages increases...honestly, thinking of marrying a Senorita and we'll both just enjoy each other without needing to know my opinion on her friend Juanita's new boyfriend or her opinion on ammo prices. We'll figure out the basics of "good food", "bad food", "tired", "frisky", and I already know Ocho is Eight - so I think we're pretty much ready.
body_html: Success rate of marriages increases...honestly, thinking of marrying a Senorita and we'll both just enjoy each other without needing to know my opinion on her friend Juanita's new boyfriend or her opinion on ammo prices. We'll figure out the basics of "good food", "bad food", "tired", "frisky", and I already know Ocho is Eight - so I think we're pretty much ready.

post.title: In an alternate universe, male and female brains are so different, that they cannot speak or learn the same languages. What else is different as a result?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
They'd be more successful if they were the same. And they are a lot more often than you'd think, it's just that natural selection favors the most stereotypical people so they have more interest in dating and sex.

Well maybe not, because humans suck at getting along in general, even if they're exactly the same.
body_html:
They'd be more successful if they were the same. And they are a lot more often than you'd think, it's just that natural selection favors the most stereotypical people so they have more interest in dating and sex.

Well maybe not, because humans suck at getting along in general, even if they're exactly the same.

post.title: In an alternate universe, male and female brains are so different, that they cannot speak or learn the same languages. What else is different as a result?

author.bio: I'm off ripping dank nooners IRL now, If you happen to meet me out on your bike, I'll always signal, "two wheels down". Drive safe.
author.bio_html: I'm off ripping dank nooners IRL now, If you happen to meet me out on your bike, I'll always signal, "two wheels down". Drive safe.

body:
This is a fun one to ponder. I guess men would be a lot dumber and *weaker*. Basically there is no way for a mother to bond with their son or stimulate them mentally. The father would also not be around to care for the child, because he lacks the biological abilty to do so and he can't understand the woman that gave birth to his son. If there is a daughter in play things would probably go really south for the young boy. He would probably be neglected in some shape or form leading to the usual bad things. 

The longer I contemplate the more sure I become that in that world women would rule men, and I went into this thinking it would just be violent men raping women to have offspring. But the logistics just don't add up. After al,l it would provoke an evolutionary armsrace between men and women to be stronger than the other, but women would win that by default because they are the sole caretakers of the offspring so they just have to negect male offspring to keep them weak.

So over time (if we are starting this at the "dawn of man") I guess men would evolve to lose their larger stature and superior strenght because the ones that survive the longest and will be able to have offspring will be the ones that can survive malnourishment at an infant age.

Or I could be looking at this wrong. 

And no this isn't some weird sexual thing where I want women to abuse me and keep me as some malnourished servent in their lush mansion... I swear...  :pepe-flushed:
body_html:
This is a fun one to ponder. I guess men would be a lot dumber and weaker. Basically there is no way for a mother to bond with their son or stimulate them mentally. The father would also not be around to care for the child, because he lacks the biological abilty to do so and he can't understand the woman that gave birth to his son. If there is a daughter in play things would probably go really south for the young boy. He would probably be neglected in some shape or form leading to the usual bad things.

The longer I contemplate the more sure I become that in that world women would rule men, and I went into this thinking it would just be violent men raping women to have offspring. But the logistics just don't add up. After al,l it would provoke an evolutionary armsrace between men and women to be stronger than the other, but women would win that by default because they are the sole caretakers of the offspring so they just have to negect male offspring to keep them weak.

So over time (if we are starting this at the "dawn of man") I guess men would evolve to lose their larger stature and superior strenght because the ones that survive the longest and will be able to have offspring will be the ones that can survive malnourishment at an infant age.

Or I could be looking at this wrong.

And no this isn't some weird sexual thing where I want women to abuse me and keep me as some malnourished servent in their lush mansion... I swear...
